header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Holiday, Barcelona, Paris, future plans, the weekend, tv shows, food, family, boyfriends,
header.activity: Catch-up with house-mate after a weekend away in Barcelona.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, inviting, announcing, anecdote telling, making arrangement

body.u: no erm so what? yeah we turned up obviously on the Thursday night and we got in at about one and the well no about twelve and the taxi driver we've got a taxi from the airport to the place cos we don't wanna be wandering around in the dark erm and then we once we arrived like on the street where we were staying there was a police car and them like dealing with some scruffians or whatever you wanna call them ruffians so we were like great this is the entrance to our street and then you walk down the street and there were bars open and stuff but a lot of it was closed and a lot of it just had like graffiti all down the sides so it was like okay in the daytime it was really pleasant but at night everything just seemed a bit erm yeah just unloved and vandalised and erm but it was it was nice but erm like unlike Paris where like you know the Eiffel Tower and Notre Dame and and the Louvre are all kind of like really close to each other in Barcelona they're not like one's like up here by five kilometres the next one is like down here by another how many kilometres and you just end up walking around trying to find everything so you spend more time walking than actually sightseeing but erm you can get like a tour bus and everything like that but because we were there for such a short period of time like none of us had really rea researched how to use the public or what public transport to use
yeah
so we just kind of end up walking everywhere which was fine for me and but I think and were not used to the amount of walking
mm
so erm but it was really ni it was nice the first day we arrived and we went to like we wandered round and we found this like festival thing
mm

erm and then went to in the evening went to this erm massive light erm fountain exhibition like they have the beautiful it's it's not a stately home it's now the national museum but it looks like it used to be palace or a stately home and it's like up erm up a hill with like fountains and like beautiful steps and at the bottom there's this massive fountain and they had this music and water display and that was again miles away so you had to walk all the way there and you know when like you're in a city with people who like none of you know where you're going but you're the one who's kind of vaguely suggested doing this and you end up being in charge? so I was like okay let's walk this way and then when you kind of get the wrong way they're like you know it's not my fault I've never been here before

erm and then but we did see the er Sagrada Familia and that was amazing like really really impressive you've got to walk in and you're just like wow like it was incredible but it certainly is like a city definitely worth going to but it wasn't as pretty as some of the other cities I've been to well the beach was actually okay it's well quite a lot of people slag off the beach well I ththought it was fine
like I didn't think it was a bad beach although oh my god I've never seen so much nakedness in my life
oh wow
